description: Multicentric cohort of  Kidney Transplant Recipients, 28,818 Kidney Transplant Recipients, clinical and biological (Paxgene, PBMC, sera, plasma, biopsies, RNA, DNA) databases.

1800 patients, Multicentre cohort of ICU patients followed for 3 months, associated with the creation of a database to identify and validate risk factors for hospital-acquired pneumonia (Declaration to CNIL: n°2001209 v 0, 09/11/2017).
